name: Asha Verma
bio: Specialist in love, marriage, and family issues. Known for compassionate and intuitive readings.

name: Raghav Tiwari
bio: Career and business astrologer with a background in psychology and Vedic sciences.

name: Soni Pandey
bio: Focuses on spiritual guidance, chakra balancing, and mental wellness through astrology.

name: Manoj Kumar Joshi
bio: Expert in financial astrology and investment-related predictions. Helps clients with long-term planning.

name: Neha Kapoor
bio: Tarot reader and astrologer who helps with decision-making in relationships and daily challenges.

name: Harsh Mehta
bio: Guides individuals facing personal confusion or crossroads in life using natal chart readings.

name: Divya Sharma
bio: Known for child birth-related consultations and fertility astrology using ancient techniques.

name: Ankit Desai
bio: Helps students and professionals with career path predictions, study success, and exam anxiety.

name: Ritu Jain
bio: Focuses on past-life connections, karmic issues, and soul-purpose discovery through astrology.

name: Vikram Rathore
bio: Experienced in health-related astrology and offering remedies for physical and emotional wellness.
